title: My Uni Page
content:
Hello! You’ve stumbled across my site for hosting uni stuff.
There’s not much here at the moment, so here’s a picture of a poorly-drawn cookie:

title: Phaser Example
content: var config = { type: Phaser.AUTO, width: 800, height: 600, parent: 'phasergame', physics: { default: 'arcade', arcade: { gravity: { y: 200 } } }, scene: { preload: preload, create: create } }; var game = new Phaser.Game(config); function preload () { this.load.setBaseURL('http://labs.phaser.io'); this.load.image('sky', 'assets/skies/space3.png'); this.load.image('logo', 'assets/sprites/phaser3-logo.png'); this.load.image('red', 'assets/particles/red.png'); } function create () { this.add.image(400, 300, 'sky'); var particles = this.add.particles('red'); var emitter = particles.createEmitter({ speed: 100, scale: { start: 1, end: 0 }, blendMode: 'ADD' }); var logo = this.physics.add.image(400, 100, 'logo'); logo.setVelocity(100, 200); logo.setBounce(1, 1); logo.setCollideWorldBounds(true); emitter.startFollow(logo); }
